content.rendered:
Directed by Sarang Sathaye.

Written by Sarang Sathaye. Sarang Sathaye. Saurabh Shamraj. Saurabh Shamraj.

Cast Sambhaji Sasane (Papdya). Jagdish Kannam (Akshay). Prakash Patil (Papdya’s father). Danny Pandit (Pankaj). Sarang Sathaye (Vikas). Shraddha Pawar (Papdya’s mother). Gayatri Bansode (Kamal). Sarang Bhambure (Game player). Prakash Koli (Game player). Sumit Patil (Sumit). Vandana Jiwane (Piyu’s mother). Pratik Sathe (Game player). Mayuresh Shinde (Game player). Deepali Pandit Dhavale (Sumit’s mother). Mohan Agashe (Shantanu) .Lalit Prabhakar . Dhananjay Sardeshpande (Akshay’s father). Neha Thombre (Piyu’s sister). Sambhaji Tangde (Shriram). Saurabh Shamraj (Shridhar) .Mrunal Divekar . Swanand Tendulkar (Kedar). Mansi Mohol (Pankaj 2nd girlfriend). Payal Amar Pande (Nakushi). Prathiba Vale (Akshay’s mother). Vinayak Lele (Workshop uncle). Shalini Chavan (Vasti bai). Jayant Gadekar (Wable). Raunak Bhise (Akshay’s sister). Akshay Nar (Suresh). Santosh Kumar Abale (Farm Buyer). Sunita Aashish Varma (Woman in farm). Pirgonda Dagdu Khot (Baba (old man)). Tushar Kudalkar (Nagya). Ganesh Gaikwad (Constable). Nachiket Chidgopkar (Interviewer). Shrinandan Kajave (Little boy) .Jaydeep Kodolikar . Sagar Yadav (Watchmen). Pandit Dhavale (Shankar)

Language Marathi.

Producers Ankush Kulshrestha. Paula McGlynn. Anusha Nandakumar. Sarang Sathaye. Swanand Tendulkar. Omkar Jadhav. Rohan Khare.

Production Bharatiya Digital Party.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 6

Status On Going (2022–)
